name: Robot Overload
description:
Command robots! Destroy targets! Lose control when bombs send your robots flying!

Default controls:

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Z - Jump
  • X - Attack
  • C - Activate robot

Default gamepad controls

  • Left stick / Dpad - Move
  • A - Jump
  • X - Attack
  • B - Activate robot

Game jam asset details:
UI graphics are from an asset pack. All other art assets were made by me. The smiley face and explosion were drawn previously and the remaining art assets were drawn during the jam.
The few sound effects that are in the game were created during the jam, using bfxr.
